name: Resume Builder (Notion Template)
description: Elevate your job search with my sleek and professional Notion resume template. Designed to showcase your skills and experience in an organized and visually appealing way, this template is your key to making a lasting impression on potential employers. With Notion AI now integrated, effortlessly generate the "About me" section using the AI-powered prompt and make your resume unique!Benefits: Minimalist design: A clean and visually attractive design that highlights your strengths and makes your re
features: Minimalist design: A clean and visually attractive design that highlights your strengths and makes your resume stand out.; Easy to update: Notion's user-friendly interface allows you to quickly update and maintain your resume as you gain new experiences and skills.; Online access: No more dealing with attachments or formatting issues - your resume is available online anytime, anywhere, from Notion.; Notion AI integration: Use the AI-powered prompt to create a personalized and engaging "About me" section for your resume.; About me (with Notion AI integration)
